channel.title: How do you report Servers for selling spots?
channel.description:
I know of many servers that sell spots :eek:
these are bad servers :eek:
they make me mad :eek:
i know that selling spots on real rs is illegal :D
how do i report those servers? :confused:
HELP ME!!! :o

item.title: How do you report Servers for selling spots?
item.dc:creator: @_ownage1 ~ownage~
item.description:
@_ownage1 wrote:

[quote=“man for man, post:1, topic:81461”]I know of many servers that sell spots :eek:

these are bad servers :eek:

they make me mad :eek:

i know that selling spots on real rs is illegal

how do i report those servers?

HELP ME!!! :o[/quote]

Bottom right part of that post click report to moderator and write what they did and send it, A moderator will lock that thread ASAP.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you report Servers for selling spots?

item.title: How do you report Servers for selling spots?

yea its not illegal…a lot of peeps do it never got in trouble before

item.title: How do you report Servers for selling spots?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_k Pure k
item.description:
@Pure_k wrote:

They cant just say it on topic but they can sell on THEIR sever im pretty sure.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you report Servers for selling spots?
item.dc:creator: @I_Im4eversmart_I I Im4eversmart I
item.description:
@I_Im4eversmart_I wrote:

Sorry i dont got a link to proov it,

but once i saw mod taharok say that people can sell whatever they want on their server.

BUT! Do not say it or post it on forums

Read full topic
item.source: How do you report Servers for selling spots?

item.title: How do you report Servers for selling spots?
item.dc:creator: @jordan7 Jordan7
item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

[quote=“Zzz O zzZ, post:2, topic:81461”]On There Server Advertisement, Click At The Bottom Of Fist Post 'Report To Moderator"
And Just Tell Them They Are Selling Spots On The Server.[/quote]
Go Ahead, They can’t do anything about people selling staff on their server. I reported that once and they said they have no control over it, so if you don’t like it don’t play on server.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you report Servers for selling spots?
